## Front Carries
- Front Reinforced Torso Sling (FRTS)
- Half Front Wrap Cross Carry (Half FWCC)
- Semi Front Wrap Cross Carry (Semi FWCC)

## Hip Carries
- Hip Cross Carry (HCC)
- Hip Kangaroo Carry (HKC)
- Hip Reinforced Torso Sling (HRTS)
- Poppins Hip Carry

## Back Carries
- Back Reinforced Torso Sling (BRTS) _aka Half Double Hammock_
- Double Hammock Double Rings (DHDR)
- Double Sling (DS)
- Half Jordan's Back Carry (HJBC)
- Knotless Ruck
- Lola's Back Carry
- Reinforced Rear Ruck (RRR) _aka Pirate Carry_
- Shepherd's Back Carry
- Short Back Cross Carry (SBCC)
